member.name: M:KGIS.AE.ControlsSynchronizer.AddFrameworkControl(System.Object)
member.summary: by passing the application's toolbars and TOC to the synchronization class, it saves you the management of the buddy control each time the active control changes. This method ads the framework control to an array; once the active control changes, the class iterates through the array and calls SetBuddyControl on each of the stored framework control.

member.name: M:KGIS.AE.ControlsSynchronizer.RemoveFrameworkControl(System.Object)
member.summary: Remove a framework control from the managed list of controls

member.name: M:KGIS.AE.ControlsSynchronizer.RemoveFrameworkControlAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove a framework control from the managed list of controls by specifying its index in the list

member.name: M:KGIS.AE.ControlsSynchronizer.SetBuddies(System.Object)
member.summary: when the active control changes, the class iterates through the array of the framework controls and calls SetBuddyControl on each of the controls.

member.name: M:KGIS.AE.GeoDBAPI.DeleteNoExistTable(ESRI.ArcGIS.Geodatabase.IWorkspace)
member.summary: 因为有些矢量表删除后，GDB_GeomColumns还存在被删除表的记录， 此方法是为了删除GDB_GeomColumns表对应表的记录：防止GDAL读取图层时矢量表已经删除，但GDB_GeomColumns还有被删除的表的记录，会出现找不到表的错误 GDB_GeomColumns是记录当前数据库存在的所有矢量表记录
